name: Acknowledge
description: 0  Command to acknowledge that cmd was received

name: Error
description: 1  Command to report errors

name: FloatAddition
description: 2  Command to request add two floats

name: FloatAdditionResult
description: 3  Command to report addition result

name: GetFwVerNum
description: 4  Command to get firmware version as a float

name: GetFwVerStr
description: 5  Command to get firmware version as a string

name: MoveToPosition
description: 6  Command to move current motor to absolute target position

name: GetCurrentMotorStatus
description: 7  Command to get current motor status

name: CurrentMotorStop
description: 8  Command to stop current motor move

name: AwaitCurrentMotorMoveDone
description: 9  Command to await motor move completion

name: InitializeAxis
description: 10 Command to init current axis using optical switch

name: SetMovePolarity
description: 11 Command to set move polarity; false is clockwise positive, reversed (true) is ccw positive

name: MoveRelative
description: 12 Command to move motor to relative target position

name: GetPosition
description: 13 Command to get current motor position

name: SetMaxTravel
description: 14 Command to set max travel distance

name: SetMaxSpeed
description: 15 Command to set max motor speed

name: SetCurrentScaling
description: 16 Command to set motor current scaling (% of max current) -- added in V1.0.1

name: SetCurrentAxis
description: 17 Command to set current axis (defaults to 1) -- added in V1.0.2

name: MultiMoveToPosition
description: 18 Command to move multiple motors to absolute target position -- added in V1.0.3

name: MultiMoveRelative
description: 19 Command to move multiple motors to relative target position -- added in V1.0.4

name: SetAcceleration
description: 20 Command to set acceleration value in steps/sec/sec (default is 50,000)

name: MoveContinuous
description: 21 Command to rotate until stopped

name: ResetPosition
description: 22 Command to reset the current motor position to zero

name: SetMaxHomeSearchMove
description: 23 Command to set max search distance for home

name: SetHomingSpeed
description: 24 Command to set homing speed

name: GetHomeFlagState
description: 25 Command to get home flag state for current axis

name: GetLastInitPosition
description: 26 Command to get last axis init position

name: SetMotorEnabledState
description: 27 Command to set flag specifying whether motor is enabled

name: LEDsOff
description: 28 Command to set color of all NeoPixels to Off

name: LEDsIdle
description: 29 Command to set color of all NeoPixels to Blue

name: LEDsRun
description: 30 Command to send green Wipe pattern to NeoPixels

name: LEDsError
description: 31 Command to send red Flash pattern to NeoPixels

name: GetADCRawVoltage
description: 32 Command to get ADC value in unscaled units -- added in V1.0.18

name: SetOutHigh
description: 33 Command to set an output pin high

name: SetOutLow
description: 34 Command to set an output pin low

name: SetLimitSwitchPolarity
description: 35 Command to set polarity of switches used; T=default (false if blocked)

name: SetCurrentLimitSwitch
description: 36 Command to set currently active limit switch (it is auto-set on axis change)

name: HInitializeXY
description: 37 Command to init X axis of H-Bot using optical switch

name: HMoveRelative
description: 38 Command to move X,Y of H-Bot to relative target position

name: HMoveToPosition
description: 39 Command to move X,Y of H-Bot to absolute target position; 3 params (1st param is 1, 2, 3 for X, Y, Both)

name: HGetXY
description: 40 Command to get X,Y coordinate of H-Bot

name: GetDebugStr
description: 41 Command to get Debug string

name: HMoveDoneMssg
description: 42 Message to communicate that an H-move is complete: HInitializeXY, HMoveRelative, HMoveToPosition

name: SetHoldCurrentScaling
description: 43 for compatibility with L6470 firmware

name: SetMicroStepModeL6470
description: 44 for compatibility with L6470 firmware

name: LEDsSetColor
description: 45 Command to set color of each NeoPixel (3)

name: EnableEOT
description: 46 Command to enable all EOT sensors to stop motion on change

name: DisableEOT
description: 47 Command to disable all EOT sensors to stop motion on change

name: Set2209StallThresh
description: 48 Command to set TMC2209 stall threshold value

name: Set2209MotorCurrent
description: 49 Command to set TMC2209 motor current in mA

name: Set2209MicroStepMode
description: 50 Command to set TMC2209 microstep mode -- param is 2,4,8,16,...,256

name: StopOn2209Stall
description: 51 Command to set TMC2209 to stop when threshold exceeded -- param T|F

name: Init2209
description: 52 Command to initialize the TMC2209

name: SensorOverride
description: 53 Command to stop on any of the 8 sensors

name: SensorPolarity
description: 54 Command to set polarity of any of the 8 sensors

name: GetSensorState
description: 55 Command to get state of any of the 8 sensors

name: SetFlexiForceStallThresh
description: 56 Command to set FlexiForce stall threshold value for current motor

name: StopOnFlexiForceStall
description: 57 Command to set current motor to stop when FlexiForce threshold exceeded -- param T|F

name: GetFlexiForce
description: 58 Command to get last value of FlexiForce Sensor specified in the param (1 or 2)

name: GetSwitchSet
description: 59 Command to get last value of Switch Block specified in the param (1 or 2 -- 1=microswitches, 2=optoswitches)

name: StreamFlexiForceDebug
description: 60 Command to stream FlexiForce debug data -- param T|F

name: StreamSwitchSetDebug
description: 61 Command to stream Switch settings (debug); Switch Block specified in the param (1 or 2 -- 1=microswitches, 2=optoswitches)

name: CallbacksForSwitchChanges
description: 62 Command to enable or disable callbacks on Switch Changes

name: LEDsSetPattern
description: 63 Command to set color and pattern of each NeoPixel (3) -- added V1.26

name: LEDsSetBrightness
description: 64 Command to set brightness of NeoPixels (3) -- added V1.26

name: GetReflectiveSensorValue
description: 65 Command to get last value of Reflective Sensor specified in the param (1 or 2)

name: StreamReflectiveValues
description: 66 Command to stream Reflective debug data -- param T|F

name: GetLightSensorValue
description: 67 Command to get last value of Light Sensor specified in the param (1 or 2)

name: StreamLightValues
description: 68 Command to stream Light debug data -- param T|F
